23 
•The width of a random smile correlates with the length 
of life; 
•A single smile can give you as much energy as 1,000 
bars of chocolate. 
•Children smile on average about 400 times a day. 
Adults smile on average only about 15. 
•Business insider 
Otros aspectos no verbales
